name: Profiles of the Forgotten
storyline: Jason returns to his family's lake front vacation home to visit his beloved stepsister only to find out that she will only interact with him through a computer. As Jason attempts to meet with his stepsister in person, he falls into a series of nightmarish scenarios, including a date with a girl in Pink, a lecture on Gothic Literature, a football game on the beach and much more.
summary: A first person narrative that mixes abstract and dreamlike locations with live action full motion cutscenes.
